name: Corrupted Soul
description:
A way of a paladin is hard and he need defeat the horrors of the world.

This is a game for a jam, we cant have time to add music and sounds... T_T
Our objetive is kill de monsters until arrive to the last battle, and then, fight with our friends for the best score (but this version not have score yet).

WITH KEYBOARD

Arrows - Move

Space - Jump

Ctrl - Attack

S - Beam

D - Dash

WITH XBOX CONTROLLER

Move with analog

A - Jump

X - Attack

LB - Beam

RB - Dash

Game Design and Programming by Daniel Santigosa

Art Work by Isabel Arboleya & Magin Marqués
